text: 24.2: Jer 26.18 naŋga, Mai 3.12 naŋga, Lu 19.44Kamatɨhura nurɨŋ kuyu nɨmata ambami, Narɨ tavɨ paŋgarɨvaŋgarɨ nɨŋɨnɨŋ ŋgara. Narɨŋ yi kandɨ ambin, tɨmba musɨmbɨrɨ ndahara mitɨtu tɨmba muhɨmbañɨ maŋgɨyɨmandɨ. Sɨhanaŋga yɨvukuvɨmbɨrata kavarɨtu mɨŋgurɨmandɨ, vami.24.2 Matyundu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ kuyu kutaŋguta kumanzɨpi timu tɨŋgɨruramata ambavarami hañɨndu muhanda nɨ. Kuyu kandɨnɨ 24.2—25.46 kɨyɨ. Muhɨmɨmuhɨm imbɨhɨvɨ yɨvurahɨrɨm arɨñɨdɨtɨrɨm ambavarami.
